text:
Elizabeth Folan Gilpin (born July 21, 1986) is an American actress. She was born in New York City. Gilpin is best known for playing Debbie "Liberty Belle" Eagan in the Netflix comedy series "GLOW" (2017–present).
Career.
She was nominated for two Primetime Emmy Awards for Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Comedy Series.
She also starred as Dr. Carrie Roman in the Showtime comedy-drama series "Nurse Jackie" (2013–2015). In 2020, she starred as Detective Linda Watts in the Netflix comedy movie "Coffee & Kareem".

annotations.surface_form: Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Comedy Series
